issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Follow this page https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tp/Debugger+Test+Plan to setup the project and run step 1023

Expected result:
Should hit breakpoint at app.js:90

Actual result:
Hits breakpoint at app.js:91
fields.summary: Android : Debugger - v8 debugger hitting breakpoint of debugger test early
fields.environment:
Ti Studio 1.0.7.201112141707
Ti Mob SDK 1.8.0.1.v20111214093905 v8
Windows 7
Emulator 2.2

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress over the past few years.
